summary: This document is an email correspondence primarily between Jeffery Edwards and Jes Staley discussing various topics including financial markets and political events. The conversation touches on concerns regarding oil prices and the implications of events at AIG and UBS. The email includes disclaimers about confidentiality and the nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Jeffery Edwards is the sender of the email, discussing financial markets and political events.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, engaging in a discussion about market conditions and political implications.

keyFacts: The email discusses concerns about falling oil prices.
Jeffery Edwards and Jes Staley are discussing the implications of events at AIG and UBS.
The communication includes disclaimers about confidentiality and the nature of the information shared.
